ewcommand{\Mee}[9]{ egin{bmatrix} #1 & #2 & #3  r #4 & #5 & #6  r #7 & #8 & #9 \end{bmatrix}}$ $
ewcommand{ }[1]{ oldsymbol{#1}}$ Note We do not discuss everything in great detail here since everything has been discussed in MATH 115A Section 1.
